summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Harvest (canvassing) feature bug fix. All reported issues are now resolved - pin clicks open bottom panel, status buttons update pin status correctly, tabs switch properly, and layer toggles work.
critical_code_review_comments: Pin click handler using document event listener with capture phase is working correctly
pinsRef maintains pin state for DOM handler - proper React pattern
Status buttons have data-testid attributes for testing
Property Hub theme matches Eden with orange accents and gray-900 header
context_for_next_testing_agent: Harvest canvassing feature fully tested. Pin clicks work via DOM event listener with capture phase. Status buttons update correctly. All tabs (Map, Ranks, Compete, Badges) and layer toggles (Satellite, Hybrid, Street) working.

harvest_page_loads.details: Harvest page loads with map, pins visible, header shows 'Harvest' with door count and signed count

pin_clicks_open_panel.details: Clicking on pins opens bottom panel with address, status badge, status buttons, contact form, and action buttons

status_buttons_work.details: All 6 status buttons (Not Home, Not Int., Callback, Appt, Signed, DNK) update pin status correctly with visual feedback

tabs_switch_correctly.details: All 4 tabs work: Map (shows map with pins), Ranks (leaderboard), Compete (competitions), Badges (10 badges)

layer_toggle_works.details: All 3 layer toggles work: Satellite (aerial imagery), Hybrid (satellite + labels), Street (OpenStreetMap)

save_contact_works.details: Contact form accepts name, phone, email, notes. Save Contact button saves data successfully

property_hub_theme.details: Property Hub has orange accents, gray-900 header, Carrier-Defensible badge, Weather/DOL and Property Intel tabs

bug_fix_verification.original_issue: Harvest (canvassing feature) buttons don't work. Pin clicks weren't opening the bottom panel, and status buttons weren't functioning.
bug_fix_verification.fix_applied: Pin clicks now use document event listener with capture phase to intercept clicks before Leaflet. pinsRef maintains pin state for DOM handler.

ui_elements_verified.harvest_header: Orange gradient icon, 'Harvest' title, door count, 'Live' badge
ui_elements_verified.map_controls: Add pin button, locate button, territories toggle, refresh button
ui_elements_verified.bottom_panel: Address/coordinates, status badge, 6 status buttons, contact form, Save Contact, Start Pitch buttons, Knock History
ui_elements_verified.tabs: Map, Ranks, Compete, Badges with orange active state
ui_elements_verified.layer_toggle: Satellite, Hybrid, Street buttons with orange active state
